amendment.description: To establish a deficit neutral reserve fund for influenza vaccine shortage prevention.

vote.text: Amendment SA 155 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 155 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S2941-2942, S2942; text: CR S2941) To establish a deficit neutral reserve fund for influenza vaccine shortage prevention.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 155 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 155 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Clinton.
